creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
<map:match pattern="xhtml.xml/*/*/*/*">
        <map:generate src="cocoon:/lenyametadata.xml/{1}/{2}/{3}/{4}"/>
        <map:transform
src="fallback://lenya/modules/resource/xslt/resource2xhtml.xsl">
          <map:parameter name="document-type"
value="{page-envelope:document-type}"/>

This will lead to errors (use doc-info module instead).
